backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining access control, user profiles, and system configuration with admin/user role management and storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping requested features to affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of key frontend components and pages.
frontend/.env.pinata.example: Example environment file showing required Pinata JWT and optional gateway variables for IPFS pinning.
frontend/dist/.ic-assets.json5: Asset canister configuration defining caching, MIME types, and SPA fallback rules for deployed frontend files.
frontend/dist/index.html: Built HTML entrypoint containing SEO metadata, PWA settings, structured data, and links to generated assets.
frontend/docs/build-optimization-notes.m: Documentation of build optimizations including code splitting, vendor chunking, and Vite configuration changes.
frontend/docs/pinata-pinning.md: Guide explaining how to configure and use Pinata SDK scripts to pin files to IPFS with required environment variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining metadata, SEO tags, structured data, and loads the main React app.
frontend/public/.well-known/ic-domains: Declares approved domains for Apple domain association.
frontend/public/generated/.gitkeep: Placeholder file ensuring the generated assets directory is tracked.
frontend/public/generated/GENERATION_GUI: Detailed instructions and specifications for generating all required visual assets.
frontend/public/generated/STYLE-GUIDE.tx: Defines the visual style, colors, typography, and asset consistency rules for the project.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest configuring icons, theme colors, shortcuts, and app metadata.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Crawler directives allowing most paths while blocking sensitive areas and defining sitemap and crawl-delay.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker implementing asset caching, navigation handling, and cache version management.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: XML sitemap listing all public site URLs with metadata and hreflang entries.
frontend/restore-assets.js: Node script validating and restoring required PNG assets in the generated folder.
frontend/scripts/pinata-fs-utils.mjs: Provides deterministic recursive file discovery plus size and byte-format helpers.
frontend/scripts/pinata-pin.mjs: CLI script that validates env vars, discovers files, and pins them to IPFS using the modern Pinata SDK.
frontend/scripts/resend-ecopowerhub-logo: Outputs a selected Base64 slice of the monochrome-dark logo PNG without extra formatting.
Outputs a selected Base64 slice of the monochrome-white logo PNG without extra formatting.
Outputs a selected Base64 slice of the full‑color emblem PNG without extra formatting.
frontend/scripts/verify-no-deprecated-pi: Scans project directories for deprecated Pinata API calls and fails if any are found.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the React app with routing, lazy-loaded pages, theming, query client, and authenticated layout logic.
frontend/src/components/affiliate/SolarG: Affiliate section listing solar generator brands with product details, images, benefits, and tracking IDs.
frontend/src/components/affiliate/Tracki: UI widget that displays an affiliate tracking ID and provides a copy-to-clipboard button with toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/AlarmNotificatio: Displays a morning alarm popup, plays sounds once, and shows weather and energy summaries with an option to speak the update.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: Catches rendering errors and shows a recovery screen with reload and home navigation options.
frontend/src/components/AraChat.tsx: Implements a floating support chat widget that stores messages and returns random predefined assistant replies.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/AddAla: Form dialog for creating a new morning alarm, handling user input, timestamp conversion, and submitting via addAlarm mutation.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/AddSys: Dialog for adding a new system configuration with region auto-detection, supported device filtering, and form submission to the backend.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Alarms: Displays all alarms with controls for toggling, editing, deleting, and opening dialogs to manage alarm configurations.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Analyt: Fetches and visualizes historical and predicted energy data, provides deployment status checks, and supports report downloading and URL copying.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/EditAl: Modal form for editing an alarm, handling time conversion, state updates, and mutation submission.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Energy: Generates a responsive line chart displaying energy consumption and temperature over time using Recharts.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/EVAuth: Dialog for connecting a Ford or Rivian EV using a mock OAuth flow and submitting stored credentials to the backend.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Mainte: Displays system health overview with status indicators, error handling, and manual refresh for maintenance data.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/MyEVCa: Shows EV telemetry, charging state, and actions like solar charging and disconnect based on provider type.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Overvi: Aggregates system and energy data to display statistics, charts, and status summaries in the overview dashboard.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Recomm: Fetches and displays personalized energy recommendations filtered by user language with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/System: Dashboard tab for managing system configs and EV connections, showing system cards and EV connect/disconnect dialogs.
Renders cards summarizing each system’s latest energy and temperature data, or a prompt if none exist.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Temper: Renders a bar chart of temperature data with optional Celsius/Fahrenheit conversion.
frontend/src/components/diagnostics/Smar: Displays diagnostic events with status badges, icons, and error handling.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a simple footer with credits and external links to caffeine.ai and EcoPowerHub.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Shows the site header with theme toggle, user info, logout functionality, logo switching, and mobile navigation drawer.
frontend/src/components/LoadingErrorBoun: Handles loading, timeout, and network errors with status-aware UI, retry logic, and optional technical details.
Renders a marketing footer with branding, social links, navigation shortcuts, and legal links, including smooth-scroll behavior.
Provides a sticky header with theme switching, region/language selection, and navigation including mobile menu support.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Displays a modal that collects the user's name and language, auto-detects settings, and saves the profile via API.
frontend/src/components/RouteErrorFallba: Shows an error screen with details and actions to retry, reload, or navigate home when routing fails.
frontend/src/components/StableImage.tsx: Image component that avoids flicker, preserves dimensions, and shows placeholders or fallbacks on load errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, login/logout helpers, and persistence of identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query wrappers for backend operations like user profiles, system configs, admin checks, and other data types.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and utility styles including grid backgrounds and image states.
frontend/src/lib/alarmService.ts: Provides utilities for generating alarm messages, playing alarm sounds, and producing spoken morning updates with weather and energy data.
frontend/src/lib/assetRestoration.ts: Defines metadata for 58 required PNG assets and documents their required filenames, dimensions, and usage for build-time validation.
frontend/src/lib/assetVerification.ts: Lists categorized generated asset paths and includes structures used for runtime HTTP-based asset existence checks.
frontend/src/lib/generatedAssetPaths.ts: Exports a centralized object mapping all generated PNG asset names to their expected paths for use throughout the app.
frontend/src/lib/i18n.ts: Provides language and region data, temperature and timestamp utilities, right-to-left detection, and device/system type mappings.
frontend/src/lib/weather.ts: Implements weather data fetching from Open-Meteo and user geolocation retrieval, with helper mapping for weather condition codes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React application with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/BestPracticesPage.tsx: Renders a best‑practices guide with maintenance schedules using cards and accordions. Focuses on weekly and monthly system checks and device upkeep.
frontend/src/pages/ComplianceSecurityPag: Provides a compliance and security report page with print‑optimized styles and a PDF download flow. Includes detailed print rules and a button to trigger printing.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Implements the main dashboard with user‑specific greeting, admin tools, and tabbed navigation for overview, systems, alarms, insights, and analytics. Uses query hooks to load user and admin status.
Checks accessibility and SSL validity for production domains and displays deployment readiness. Includes copy‑to‑clipboard utilities and detailed status alerts.
frontend/src/pages/DeviceIntegrationGuid: Displays detailed device integration guides with setup steps, troubleshooting, privacy notes, and benefits. Uses collapsible sections and asset‑based images for multiple supported devices.
frontend/src/pages/DiagnosticsPage.tsx: Renders a diagnostics dashboard with searchable regional electrical standards and documentation links, plus a SmartDiagnosticsPanel component. Uses tabs, accordions, and UI cards for organizing system and guide data.
frontend/src/pages/DomainPortfolioPage.t: Displays a mock domain portfolio strategy with availability, pricing, and recommendations for various domain variants. Provides summary stats and separates available vs. unavailable domains.
frontend/src/pages/EmailAutomationPage.t: Implements an interface for managing automated email rules with predefined keyword triggers and short response templates. Includes toggles, scrollable lists, and toast notifications.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Defines the public landing page with a hero section, CTA button, and device setup guide previews. Emphasizes branding with background imagery and marketing components.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Provides a login flow using Internet Identity and redirects authenticated users to the dashboard. Includes feature highlights and styled UI elements for user onboarding.
frontend/src/pages/MarketingCampaignAsse: Provides UI for marketing assets including a scripted ad, banner variants, and clipboard copy functions.
frontend/src/pages/PartnerMarketplacePag: Displays a list of affiliate programs with details like commissions, benefits, and links.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Renders a static privacy policy with sections covering data collection, usage, and security.
frontend/src/pages/SupportIntegrationsPa: Fetches and displays manufacturer support data and boundaries with loading/error handling.
frontend/src/pages/TechSpecsPage.tsx: Shows technical specs including voltage compatibility, device specifications, compliance, and SCADA protocol support.
frontend/src/routes/RootRoute.tsx: Root route component that renders nested routes via Outlet.
frontend/src/types/index.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces and enums for system configs, energy data, EV data, pricing, case studies, and various frontend domain models.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, writing, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, supporting both query and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
frontend/vite-build-verify.js: Script that validates required PNG assets and dimensions in the Vite build output directories.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite config for React with custom chunk splitting, environment variable injection, aliases, and dev server proxying.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, architecture notes, known issues, and feature requirements for the EcoPowerHub frontend.
